start_menu.START_TEXT:
üëãüèª *Hello, I‚Äôm Steamy.*
 Helping you find deals, track prices, and manage your inventory

üòè *What can I do for you?*

‚Ä¢  *Price Comparison:* Find the best deals across platforms.
‚Ä¢  *Chart Analysis:* Track and analyze price trends.
‚Ä¢  *Liquidity Check:* See how easily items can be sold.
‚Ä¢  *Price Alerts:* Get price change notifications.
‚Ä¢  *Float Info:* Check item quality with Float values.
‚Ä¢  *Best Float Search:* Find the best Float offers

*Ready to explore? Let‚Äôs get started!* üöÄ

check_float.CHECK_FLOAT_TEXT:
üîç *Float Check*

To help you find the float value of your item, please send us the 'rungame' link from Steam.

*Here's how you can get it:*
1. Right-click on the item in your inventory.
2. Select *Inspect in Game*.
3. Copy the link from your browser's address bar.
4. Paste it here and send it to us.

If you need any assistance, don't hesitate to ask!
check_float.INVALID_RUNGAME_LINK:
‚ö†Ô∏è *Hmm, that doesn't seem to be a valid 'rungame' link.*

Please make sure you're sending the correct link from Steam. If you need help, here's how to get it:
1. Right-click on the item in your inventory.

2. Select *Inspect in Game*.
3. Copy the link from your browser and send it here.
